channel.title: TCGA on xiaoni's blog
channel.description: Recent content in TCGA on xiaoni's blog

item.title: Data from mRNA lncRNA and miRNA and match clinical information with R from UCSC Xena
item.description:
It’s very convenient to get datasets from UCSC Xena. Normally, datasets will need to be processed and transformed with R language.

Herein, I will recover the protocol of datasets processed.

item.title: GSCALite: Gene Set Cancer Analysis
item.description: GSCALite: a web-based platform for Gene Set Cancer Analysis.

item.title: OncoLnc: A straightforward Tool
item.description: OncoLnc Web Tool: Interactively exploring survival correlations, and for downloading clinical data coupled to expression data for mRNAs, miRNAs, or lncRNAs from TCGA.

item.title: GDC Notebook
item.description:
The Genomic Data Commons (GDC), is a research program of the National Cancer Institute (NCI).

The mission of the GDC is to provide the cancer research community with a unified data repository that enables data sharing across cancer genomic studies in support of precision medicine.

item.title: FireBrowse Notebook
item.description:
FireBrowse Homepage and BROAD GDAC.

Analysis with FIREHOSE plus TCGA UCSC Xena.
